SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ibis.ipl
Class IbisProperties

java.lang.Object
  ibis.ipl.IbisProperties

public final class IbisProperties
extends Object

Properties management for Ibis. The getDefaultProperties() method obtains the properties in the following order: first, some hardcoded properties are set. Next, a file ibis.properties is searched for in the current directory, the classpath, or the user home directory, in that order. If found, it is read as a properties file, and the properties contained in it are set, possibly overriding the hardcoded properties. Finally, the system properties are obtained. These, too, may override the properties set so far.
